title: Methodology
text: Xavier, . C., Scanlon, B. R., King, C. W., & Alves, . . (2022). New improved Brazilian daily weather gridded data (1961–2020). International Journal Climatology. https://doi.org/10.1002/joc.7731 BR-DWGD dataset presents daily meteorological data interpolated grid 0.1° \(\times\) 0.1° spatial resolution Brazilian territory, daily data January 1, 1961, July 31, 2020. used data 1,252 weather stations 11,473 rain gauges interpolation methods, cross-validated selection best method weather indicator. following weather indicators available BR-DWGD study: precipitation (mm), minimum temperature (°C), maximum temperature (°C), solar radiation (\(MJ\cdot m^{-2}\)), wind speed 2m height (\(m\cdot s^{-1}\)) relative humidity (%).
code: brclimr::product_info(product = "brdwgd") #> <list> #> ├─tmax: <list> #> │ ├─link: "https://brdwgd.nyc3.cdn.digitalo..." #> │ ├─name: "Maximum temperature" #> │ ├─unit: "°C" #> │ ├─date_range: "Daily, 1961-01-01 to 2020-07-31" #> │ └─stats: <list> #> │   ├─min: "Tmax_min" #> │   ├─max: "Tmax_max" #> │   ├─mean: "Tmax_mean" #> │   └─sd: "Tmax_sd" #> ├─tmin: <list> #> │ ├─link: "https://brdwgd.nyc3.cdn.digitalo..." #> │ ├─name: "Minimum temperature" #> │ ├─unit: "°C" #> │ ├─date_range: "Daily, 1961-01-01 to 2020-07-31" #> │ └─stats: <list> #> │   ├─min: "Tmin_min" #> │   ├─max: "Tmin_max" #> │   ├─mean: "Tmin_mean" #> │   └─sd: "Tmin_sd" #> ├─pr: <list> #> │ ├─link: "https://brdwgd.nyc3.cdn.digitalo..." #> │ ├─name: "Precipitation" #> │ ├─unit: "mm" #> │ ├─date_range: "Daily, 1961-01-01 to 2020-07-31" #> │ └─stats: <list> #> │   ├─min: "pr_min" #> │   ├─max: "pr_max" #> │   ├─mean: "pr_mean" #> │   ├─sd: "pr_sd" #> │   └─sum: "pr_sum" #> ├─eto: <list> #> │ ├─link: "https://brdwgd.nyc3.cdn.digitalo..." #> │ ├─name: "Evapotranspiration" #> │ ├─unit: "mm" #> │ ├─date_range: "Daily, 1961-01-01 to 2020-07-31" #> │ └─stats: <list> #> │   ├─min: "ETo_min" #> │   ├─max: "ETo_max" #> │   ├─mean: "ETo_mean" #> │   ├─sd: "ETo_sd" #> │   └─sum: "ETo_sd" #> ├─rh: <list> #> │ ├─link: "https://brdwgd.nyc3.cdn.digitalo..." #> │ ├─name: "Relative humidity" #> │ ├─unit: "%" #> │ ├─date_range: "Daily, 1961-01-01 to 2020-07-31" #> │ └─stats: <list> #> │   ├─min: "RH_min" #> │   ├─max: "RH_max" #> │   ├─mean: "RH_mean" #> │   └─sd: "RH_sd" #> ├─rs: <list> #> │ ├─link: "https://brdwgd.nyc3.cdn.digitalo..." #> │ ├─name: "Solar radiation" #> │ ├─unit: "MJ/m2" #> │ ├─date_range: "Daily, 1961-01-01 to 2020-07-31" #> │ └─stats: <list> #> │   ├─min: "Rs_min" #> │   ├─max: "Rs_max" #> │   ├─mean: "Rs_mean" #> │   └─sd: "Rs_sd" #> └─u2: <list> #>   ├─link: "https://brdwgd.nyc3.cdn.digitalo..." #>   ├─name: "Wind speed" #>   ├─unit: "m/2" #>   ├─date_range: "Daily, 1961-01-01 to 2020-07-31" #>   └─stats: <list> #>     ├─min: "u2_min" #>     ├─max: "u2_max" #>     ├─mean: "u2_mean" #>     └─sd: "u2_sd"

title: Methodology
text: Abatzoglou, J. T., Dobrowski, S. Z., Parks, S. ., Hegewisch, K. C. (2018). TerraClimate, high-resolution global dataset monthly climate climatic water balance 1958-2015. Scientific Data, 5. https://doi.org/10.1038/sdata.2017.191

title: Parquet files
text: Evapotranspiration: https://brdwgd.nyc3.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com/parquet/eto.parquet Precipitation: https://brdwgd.nyc3.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com/parquet/pr.parquet Relative Humidity: https://brdwgd.nyc3.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com/parquet/rh.parquet Solar radiation: https://brdwgd.nyc3.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com/parquet/rs.parquet Maximum temperature: https://brdwgd.nyc3.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com/parquet/tmax.parquet Minimum temperature: https://brdwgd.nyc3.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com/parquet/tmin.parquet Wind speed: https://brdwgd.nyc3.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com/parquet/u2.parquet

title: Parquet files
text: Actual Evapotranspiration: https://terraclimate.nyc3.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com/parquet/aet.parquet Climate Water Deficit: https://terraclimate.nyc3.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com/parquet/def.parquet Potential evapotranspiration: https://terraclimate.nyc3.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com/parquet/pet.parquet Precipitation: https://terraclimate.nyc3.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com/parquet/ppt.parquet Runoff: https://terraclimate.nyc3.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com/parquet/q.parquet Soil Moisture: https://terraclimate.nyc3.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com/parquet/soil.parquet Downward surface shortwave radiation: https://terraclimate.nyc3.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com/parquet/srad.parquet Snow water equivalent: https://terraclimate.nyc3.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com/parquet/swe.parquet Max Temperature: https://terraclimate.nyc3.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com/parquet/tmax.parquet Min Temperature: https://terraclimate.nyc3.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com/parquet/tmin.parquet Vapor pressure: https://terraclimate.nyc3.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com/parquet/vap.parquet Wind speed: https://terraclimate.nyc3.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com/parquet/ws.parquet Vapor Pressure Deficit: https://terraclimate.nyc3.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com/parquet/vpd.parquet PDSI: https://terraclimate.nyc3.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com/parquet/pdsi.parquet

title: Parquet files
text: downloading parquets files, can query using arrow package.
code: library(tidyverse) library(arrow)  brdwgd <- open_dataset(sources = "/parquet/files/address/")  brdwgd %>%   filter(code_muni %in% c(3105608, 3304557, 3136702)) %>%   filter(name == "Tmax_mean") %>%   filter(date >= as.Date("2008-01-01") & date <= as.Date("2008-12-31")) %>%   select(code_muni, date, value) %>%   collect()

title: Authors and Citation
text: Raphael Saldanha. Author, maintainer. Reza Akbarinia. Author. Patrick Valduriez. Author. Marcel Pedroso. Author. Victor Ribeiro. Author. Carlos Cardoso. Author. Eduardo Pena. Author. Fabio Porto. Author.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Saldanha R, Akbarinia R, Valduriez P, Pedroso M, Ribeiro V, Cardoso C, Pena E, Porto F (2024). brclimr: Fetch Zonal Statistics Weather Indicators Brazilian Municipalities. R package version 0.2.0,  https://github.com/rfsaldanha/brclimr, https://rfsaldanha.github.io/brclimr/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {brclimr: Fetch Zonal Statistics of Weather Indicators for Brazilian Municipalities},   author = {Raphael Saldanha and Reza Akbarinia and Patrick Valduriez and Marcel Pedroso and Victor Ribeiro and Carlos Cardoso and Eduardo Pena and Fabio Porto},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.2.0,  https://github.com/rfsaldanha/brclimr},   url = {https://rfsaldanha.github.io/brclimr/}, }

what: Fetch Zonal Statistics of Weather Indicators for Brazilian Municipalities
title: Fetch Zonal Statistics of Weather Indicators for Brazilian Municipalities
text: R package retrieves zonal statistics weather indicators calculated municipality Brazil using data BR-DWGD TerraClimate projects. Zonal statistics mean, maximum, minimum, standard deviation, sum computed taking account data cells intersect boundaries municipality stored Parquet files. procedure carried Brazilian municipalities, available dates, every indicator available weather products (BR-DWGD TerraClimate projects). package queries -line already calculated statistics Parquet files returns easy--use data.frames. Details used methodology calculate zonal statistics available Articles > Methodology.

title: Fetch Zonal Statistics of Weather Indicators for Brazilian Municipalities
Fetch Zonal Statistics of Weather Indicators for Brazilian Municipalities
text: Note: stable version adopted universal solution querying Parquet files works operating systems slower. development version available Linux MacOS faster solution. details issue.

title: Fetch Zonal Statistics of Weather Indicators for Brazilian Municipalities
text: fetch data specific product, indicator statistic, use fetch_data function. example: Rio de Janeiro, RJ (IBGE code number 3304557), data product “brdwgd”, average relative humidity, 2010-10-15 2010-10-20. need query several municipalities, indicators zonal statistics, recommend download locally query parquet files using arrow package. list URLs parquet files created project available Articles > Parquet files. list indicators zonal statistics available product can retrieved function product_info.
code: library(brclimr)  fetch_data(     code_muni = 3304557,     product = "brdwgd",     indicator = "rh",     statistics = "mean",     date_start = as.Date("2010-10-15"),     date_end = as.Date("2010-10-20")   ) #> # A tibble: 6 × 2 #>   date       value #>   <date>     <dbl> #> 1 2010-10-15  74.5 #> 2 2010-10-16  73.5 #> 3 2010-10-17  77.8 #> 4 2010-10-18  90.1 #> 5 2010-10-19  74.3 #> 6 2010-10-20  71.5 product_info("brdwgd") product_info("terraclimate")

title: Fetch Zonal Statistics of Weather Indicators for Brazilian Municipalities
code: tmax <- fetch_data(   code_muni = 3303401,   product = "brdwgd",   indicator = "tmax",   statistics = "mean",   date_start = as.Date("2010-01-01"),   date_end = as.Date("2012-01-01") )  tmin <- fetch_data(   code_muni = 3303401,   product = "brdwgd",   indicator = "tmin",   statistics = "mean",   date_start = as.Date("2010-01-01"),   date_end = as.Date("2012-01-01") )  pr <- fetch_data(   code_muni = 3303401,   product = "brdwgd",   indicator = "pr",   statistics = "sum",   date_start = as.Date("2010-01-01"),   date_end = as.Date("2012-01-01") )  tmax$name <- "Tmax_avg" tmin$name <- "Tmin_avg" library(ggplot2)  ggplot(data = rbind(tmax, tmin), aes(x = date, y = value, color = name)) +   geom_line() +   scale_x_date(date_breaks = "2 months", date_labels =  "%m/%y") +   ylim(0, NA) +   labs(     title = "Nova Friburgo, RJ",     x = "Date",      y = "Temperature (average)",     color = ""   ) +   theme_bw() +   theme(legend.position = "bottom", legend.direction = "horizontal") ggplot(data = pr, aes(x = date, y = value)) +   geom_line(color = "blue") +   scale_x_date(date_breaks = "2 months", date_labels =  "%m/%y") +   ylim(0, NA) +   labs(     title = "Nova Friburgo, RJ",     x = "Date",      y = "Precipitation (sum)",     color = ""   ) +   theme_bw() +   theme(legend.position = "bottom", legend.direction = "horizontal")

title: BR-DWGD zonal statistics data — brdwgd_data
text: list BR-DWGD zonal indicators data.

title: BR-DWGD zonal statistics data — brdwgd_data
text: object class list length 7.

title: Fetch zonal statistics — fetch_data
text: Fetch zonal statistics product given municipality code dates.

title: Fetch zonal statistics — fetch_data
code: fetch_data(code_muni, product, indicator, statistics, date_start, date_end)

title: Fetch zonal statistics — fetch_data
text: code_muni numeric. IBGE municipality code number 7 digits. product string. Zonal indicator product. Options : brdwgd, terraclimate. indicator string. Indicator name product. Check available indicators product_info function. statistics string. Statistics name indicator. Check available statistics product_info function. date_start date, included selection. date_end date, included selection, must equal greater date_start.

title: Fetch zonal statistics — fetch_data
text: tibble date value columns.

title: Fetch zonal statistics — fetch_data
text: products monthly data, like terraclimate, inform start end dates fist day month. Example: .Date("2008-06-01") June, 2008.

title: Fetch zonal statistics — fetch_data
code: if (FALSE) { fetch_data(     code_muni = 3304557,     product = "brdwgd",     indicator = "tmax",     statistics = "mean",     date_start = as.Date("2008-01-01"),     date_end = as.Date("2008-01-10")  )  }

text: lhs value magrittr placeholder. rhs function call using magrittr semantics.

text: result calling rhs(lhs).

text: Adopt Digital Ocean S3 files repository.

title: brclimr 0.1.2
text: CRAN release: 2023-03-14 run example fetch_data function avoid error CRAN tests. Removed possible non-ASCII characters products info. Correction fetch_data function documentation.

title: brclimr 0.1.1
text: CRAN release: 2023-03-12 Adopt solution querying Parquet files works operating systems slower. development version available Linux MacOS faster solution (duckdb branch). Update author’s list. Remove function create rmd reports.

title: brclimr 0.1.0
text: CRAN release: 2023-03-07 brdwgd product updated include data starting form 1961-01-01. terraclimate product included. Documentation improvements.

title: brclimr 0.0.2
text: Add function create reports.

title: brclimr 0.0.1
text: fetch_data function retrieves data BRDWGD zonal product. Added NEWS.md file track changes package.
